utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Mmh... this cake is amazing!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: My God, get a room!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I would get a room with this cake. I think I could show this cake a good time!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: If you had to, what would you give up, food or sex?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sex!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Seriously, answer faster!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry honey, you know, but when she said "sex" I wasn't thinking about "sex with you"!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's like a giant hug.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ross, how about you. What would you give up, sex or food?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Food.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok, how about... uhm... sex or dinosaurs?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God. It's like Sophie's Choice.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh God. What about you, Joe? What would you give up, sex or food?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhm... oh... I don't know, it's too hard.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, you gotta pick one!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh... food. No, sex. Food! Sex! Food! Se-I don't know! Good God, I don't know, I want girls on bread!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You gotta see these latest pictures of Emma.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, how cute!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, she looks just like a little doll!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, no, no. That is a doll.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, thank God, 'cause that thing's really creepy! Look, there's Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh. Who is the blonde, she's pretty.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: OH! He's having an affair.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: He's not having an affair!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You know, I'm always right about these things.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, you're not! Last week you thought Ross was trying to kill you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I'm sorry but it's hard to believe that anyone would tell a story that dull just to tell it! See, there's something going on with them. Look, he's getting into the car with her!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, that doesn't mean anything.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah? Well, let's see. Ok, duck down.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, uhm... I have to work too. Yeah, I'm stuck at the office all day.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, well, it's a shame that you-that you miss the movie 'cause we were gonna see, you know, either "Liar, Liar" or "Betrayal", or... "An Affair To Remember".

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Those are all really old!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok, then maybe it'll be, uhm...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: "Dude, Where's My Car?"

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: They're in a caaar...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, we-we'll talk to you later. Okay, bye.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Geez!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok. Quick. We gotta find a cab and follow them.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, ok. Let me just grab my night vision goggles and my stun gun.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I got them!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! You smell like perfume and cigarettes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I was in the car with Nancy all day.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nancy doesn't smoke!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, at least the perfume is not mine, be thankful for that!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So? What do you think of the house?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It's perfect. It's everything we're been looking for.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Isn't it? Then what about the amazing wainscotting and the crown molding and the dormer windows in the attic?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And the wiggle wharms and the zip zorps? What were the things you said?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Don't you love the huge yard?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And the fireplace in the bedroom.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And Nancy said that it's really under price, because the guy lost his job and has to move in with his parents!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is bringing out a lovely color in you!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So? Do you think we should get it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't know. What do you think?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I think we should.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I do too.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is huge!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How bad you wanna smoke, right now.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't know what you mean, giant talking cigarette! Oh, by the way, Phoebe called just as I was getting into Nancy's car, so if she asks you, I was at work all day.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Gotcha. When do we tell them about this?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We don't. Not until it's a hundred percent. I mean, why upset everybody over nothing.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. Right. Oh my God that is gonna be so hard.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know. Gooooood luck with it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I just can't see Chandler cheating!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm telling you guys, we followed them out to a house in Westchester, the went in for like forty-five minutes and then they came out looking pretty happy!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler? Forty-five minutes? Well, something is not right. I just can't believe he would do this to Monica!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know, and with the baby coming?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So, should we tell her?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't know. Phoebe, if one of us saw Mike with another woman would you want us to tell you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why? WhoæŠŽ you seen him with?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No one, I'm just saying if...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: TELL ME WHAT YOU KNOW!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know nothing! Mike's a great guy, it was hypothetical!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: All right. . He is a good guy. Youâ€™re right, he wouldn't cheat.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Believe me, if I did see with someone, there's no way I...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: WHO DID YOU SEE HIM WITH?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, look at her, so happy!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: If only there were a smaller one to clean this one!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, is uhm... is Chandler here?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, he's picking up dinner, why, what's up?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, look, whatever happens, weâ€™re here for you and we love you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We think Chandler might be having an affair.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe and I saw Chandler with a blonde woman today outside on the street and then we followed them to a house in Westchester.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: They went in together. So sorry.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Oh my God that's awful! What did you think of the house?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Monica, you understand what we are saying, right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, sure... uhm, I'm devastated, obviously... Did you think the neighborhood was homey?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You son of a bitch!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is it me, or have the greetings gone downhill around here?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe and Rachel saw you with Nancy today and... em... they think you're having an affair.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Who's Nancy?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ok, alright, you guys, you'd better sit down, this is pretty big.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah I'm not having an affair. Nancy is our realtor.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I knew he couldn't be with a woman for 45 minutes!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why do you have a realtor?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uhm, she has been showing us houses outside of the city.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Are you serious?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: When we found out that we're gonna get this baby, Chandler and I started talking and we decided that we didn't want to raise a kid in the city.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So you're gonna move?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Shouldn't we all vote on stuff like this?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What is wrong with raising a kid in the city? I'm doing it, Ross is doing it, Sarah Jessica Parker is doing it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And that's great for you guys, but we want a lawn and a swingset...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: ...and a street where our kids can ride their bikes and maybe an ice-cream truck can go by.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So you wanna buy a house in the 50's?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Have you thought about what you would be giving up? You can't move out of the city, what if you want Chinese food at 5am? Or a fake Rolex that breaks as soon as it rains or an Asian hooker sent right to your door?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You know what, if you wanna look for a house, that's okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, no, it's not, don't listen to him! I'm gonna thump you!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's ok, because they have to get it out of their system, okay , but you're going to realize, this is the only place, you wanna be.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Actually, we already found a house we love.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And about an hour ago, we made an offer.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Bet you wish I was having an affair now, huh?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You put an offer on a house?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's so sweet. It really is. It has this big yard that leads down to this stream and then there's these old maple trees...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wha..? Again with the nature, what are you? Beavers?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know this is really hard and we're really sorry.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Is this because I come over here without knocking and eat your food? Because I can stop doing that, I really, really think I can!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know that's not the reason Joe.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We think if you saw it, you'd understand. I mean you guys were there. It is beautiful, isn't it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah it is.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What the hell are you doin'?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, it is, all right? When we were out there today, all I kept thinking was: I can't believe Chandler is screwing this woman, but MAN this would be a nice place to live!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, but so is this.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I mean, if you moved there, you have to leave here. I mean, how can you leave this place?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: C'mon Daddy, listen to me! All of my life, everyone has always told me, 'You're a shoe! You're a shoe, you're a shoe, you're a shoe!'. And today I just stopped and I said, 'What if I don't wanna be a shoe? What if I wanna be a- a purse, y'know? Or a- or a hat! No, I don't want you to buy me a hat, I'm saying that I am a ha- It's a metaphor, Daddy!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You can see where he'd have trouble.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well maybe I'll just stay here with Monica.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I guess we've established who's staying here with Monica...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That money is mine, Green!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You're fly is open, Geller!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You guys, you know what I just realized? 'Joker' is 'poker' with a 'J.' Coincidence?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, that's...'joincidence' with a 'C'!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Eww, look. Ugly Naked Guy lit a bunch of candles.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ow, that had to hurt!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, it's your Thanksgiving too, y'know, instead of watching football, you could help.

utterance.speaker: The Guys
utterance.content: We will.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, Rachel, you wanna put the marshmallows in concentric circles.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No Mon, you want to put them in concentric circles. I want to do this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Every year.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's stuck!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Easy. Step. How did it get on?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I put it on to scare Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God! Monica's gonna totally freak out!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It smells really bad in here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, of course it smells really bad. You have your head inside a turkey's ass!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, did you get the turkey bast-Oh my God! Oh my God! Who is that?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's Joey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I got it! How about, if we win, they have to get rid of the rooster?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oooohh that's interesting.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If you win, we give up the birds.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dah!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: But if we win, we get your apartment.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oooooh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Deal!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What was Monica's nickname when she was a field hockey goalie?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Big fat goalie.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Correct. Rachel claims this is her favorite movie...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Dangerous Liaisons.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Correct. Her actual favorite movie is...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Weekend at Bernie's.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Monica categorizes her towels. How many categories are there?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Everyday use.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Fancy.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Guest.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Fancy guest.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Two seconds...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uhh, 11!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: 11, unbelievable, 11 is correct.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler was how old when he first touched a girl's breast?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thanks man.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey had an imaginary childhood friend. His name was?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Maurice.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Correct, his profession was?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Space cowboy!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Correct! What is Chandler Bing's job?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ow...Oh Gosh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: 10 seconds, you need this or you lose the game.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's umm, it has something to do with transponding.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh-oh-oh, he's a transponce...transpondster!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's not even a word!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: NOOOOOOOOO!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You know what, you are mean boys, who are just being mean!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, don't get mad at us! No one forced you to raise the stakes!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That is not true. She did! She forced me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, we would still be living here if hadn't gotten the question wrong!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well it stupid, unfair question!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Don't blame the questions!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Would you all stop yelling in our apartment! You are ruining moving day for us!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Chandler!!! Chandler!!! Chandler, I saw what you were doing through the window! Chandler, I saw what you were doing to my sister! Now get out here!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wow! Listen, we had a good run. You know, what was it? Four? Five months? I mean, that's more than most people have in a lifetime! So, good-bye, take care, bye-bye then!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Ross. What's up bro?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What the hell are doing?!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, what's-what's going on?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I think, I think Ross knows about me and Monica.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude! He's right there!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I thought you were my best friend, this is my sister! My best friend and my sister! I-I cannot believe this!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, we're not just messing around! I love her. Okay, I'm in love with her.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm so sorry that you had to find out this way. I'm sorry, but iit-t's true, I love him too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: My best friend and my sister! I cannot believe this.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, this is the last box of your clothes. I'm just gonna label it, "What were you thinking?"

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Funny, because I was just gonna go across the hall and write that on Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok, you guys, I don't mean to make things worse, but umm, I don't want to live with Rachel anymore.

utterance.speaker: Monica and Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Youâ€™re just so mean to each other! And I don't want to end up like that with Rachel. I still like you!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, Phoebe that's fine because I'm not moving.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Whoa-whoa-whoa, Phoebe you gotta take her! You know, I-I-I said some really bad stuff about her, but you know Rachel has some good qualities that make her a good roommate. She gets tons of catalogs and umm, sheâ€™ll fold down the pages of the things she thinks that IæŠŽ like.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What else?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: When I take a shower, she leaves me little notes on the mirror.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I do. I-I do, do that.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That's nice. I like having things to read in the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: When I fall asleep on the couch after reading, she covers me over with a blanket.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well you know, I don't want you to be cold.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And when I told her that I was gonna be moving in with Chandler, she was really supportive. You were so great. You made it so easy. And now you have to leave. And I have to live with a boy!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She really left.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No problem roomie.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Can I ask you a question?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sure!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What the hell is that dog doing here?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Little toast here. I know this isn't exactly the kind of Thanksgiving that all of you all planned, but for me, this has been really great, you know, I think because it didn't involve divorce or projectile vomiting. Anyway, I was just thinking, I mean, if you'd gone to Vail, and if you guys'd been with your family, if you didn't have syphilis and stuff, we wouldn't be all together, you know? So I guess what I'm trying to say is that I'm very thankful that all of your Thanksgivings sucked.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: That's so sweet.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And hey, here's to a lousy Christmas.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And a crappy New Year.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Here, here!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You can't move. You just... you just can't.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Rachel's right. This is where you guys belong.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, you don't wanna live in Westchester. That's like the worst of the Chesters.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You know, sometimes when I'm alone in my apartment, I look over here and you guys... are just having dinner or... watching TV or something, but... it makes me feel better. And now when I look over, who am I gonna see? The Gottliebs, the Yangs? They don't make me feel so good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. So don't move, okay? Just stay here and... maybe close your blinds at night.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hello? It's Nancy, they responded to our offer.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, thanks... They passed. They said they wouldn't go a penny under the asking price.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We can't afford that.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, there you go.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm really sorry you guys.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. I'm sorry too. I'm even more sorry that that phone call didn't come before I told you about looking through the window.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, we're gonna let you be alone.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You're gonna be okay?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, we'll be okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Love you guys.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You know, I'm really sorry I wasn't more supportive before.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's okay, we understand.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And about this Nancy thing... If you're not sleeping with her, should I?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know there'll be other houses, but it's just so... I love that one so much.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah... Well, it's a good thing we got it then.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We got the house.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I just didn't want to tell you in front of them.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! My God! We've got the house!?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We're getting the house. We're getting the house.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And a baby...

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: We're growing up.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We sure are.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So who's gonna tell them?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Not it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Not it! Damn it!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rachel, this is yours.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Aah! Why? What are these for?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You'll see.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, everybody open them!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ooh! Oh wow this is so beautiful.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! These are the ones I was looking at in the store.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I love this.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: A meatball Sub? Thanks!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Seriously you guys, what's going on? What are these for?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I didn't know how to tell you before, but... We got the house.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Enjoy!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What did they say?
